Sentencas: The defect association modifies the energy barrier for oxygen ion hopping between the vacancies, which is sensitive to the dopant ionic size in the CeO2-delta.
Titulo: Validation of defect association energy on modulating oxygen ionic conductivity in low temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Here, the work focuses on the co-dopant strategy of M0.1Sm0.1Ce0.8O2-delta (M = Yb, Gd, Sm, Nd, La) to study the defect association energy, and its subsequent effect on ionic conduction and power density.
Titulo: Validation of defect association energy on modulating oxygen ionic conductivity in low temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The electrolyte material with different co-dopants modifies the lattice parameter and bond length of cation-anion, which changes the defect-dopant interactions.
Titulo: Validation of defect association energy on modulating oxygen ionic conductivity in low temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Among the tested dopant, Nd0.1Sm0.1Ce0.8O2-delta exhibits the highest ionic conductivity of 34 mS cm1 at 550 ?
Titulo: Validation of defect association energy on modulating oxygen ionic conductivity in low temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: C, which is nearly 2.3 times higher than the conventional Sm0.2Ce0.8O2-delta.
Titulo: Validation of defect association energy on modulating oxygen ionic conductivity in low temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: This experimental observation validates the theoretically proposed concept of the balanced defect-dopant interactions at different sites leading to the reduction in defect association enthalpy.
Titulo: Validation of defect association energy on modulating oxygen ionic conductivity in low temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The experimental results were rationalized by calculating the defect association enthalpy for the co-doped system using density functional theory via one-cell method.
Titulo: Validation of defect association energy on modulating oxygen ionic conductivity in low temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The cell with Nd0.1Sm0.1Ce0.8O2-delta as an electrolyte shows a peak power density of 466 mW cm-2 at 550 ?C, which is twice higher than the cell containing standard Sm0.2Ce0.8O2-delta electrolyte (212 mW cm? 2).
Titulo: Validation of defect association energy on modulating oxygen ionic conductivity in low temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The results confirm that Nd0.1Sm0.1Ce0.8O2-delta is the potential electrolyte for low temperature SOFC operation.
Titulo: Validation of defect association energy on modulating oxygen ionic conductivity in low temperature solid oxide fuel cell
